welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Churchdown, an enchanting town known for its picturesque countryside and friendly residents. We invite you to relax and explore our charming city, filled with hidden gems and rich history. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
